reviews.label: Guest reviews
reviews.title: What our guests say
reviews.subtitle: Read authentic experiences from guests who spent unforgettable moments with us.
reviews.review1: Absolutely stunning place! The cabin exceeded all our expectations. The view from the terrace was breathtaking.
reviews.review2: Perfect spot for a romantic weekend for two. Privacy, quiet, and beautiful nature.
reviews.review3: We spent an amazing week here with the family. Kids loved the nature and we enjoyed the peace.
reviews.review4: Exactly what we needed ‚Äì an escape from city noise and time for ourselves.
reviews.review5: Our favorite cabin, I keep coming back for the third time. Always perfect!
reviews.review6: A dream romantic weekend. The cabin is beautiful, clean, and has everything you need.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Need help?
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions from our guests.
faq.q1: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faq.a1: Check-in is available from 3:00 PM, check-out by 10:00 AM. Contact us if you need flexibility ‚Äì we're happy to accommodate.
faq.a2: Yes, pets are welcome by prior arrangement. Please let us know when booking.
faq.a3: Yes, there is free private parking for 2 cars right at the cabin.
faq.q4: Is there a quiet hours policy?
faq.a4: Yes, out of respect for neighbors, we ask guests to observe quiet hours from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM.
faq.a5: Free cancellation up to 7 days before arrival. Later cancellations are charged 50% of the booking.
faq.a6: Standard minimum is 2 nights, during holidays and peak season 3 nights.
